content.Age: Short Number of ticks the item has been 'untouched'. After 6000 ticks (5 minutes) the item is destroyed.
content.Health: Short The health of the item, starts at 5. Items take damage from fire, lava, falling anvils and explosions. The item is destroyed when its health reaches 0.
content.PickupDelay: Short Number of ticks the item cannot be picked up for.
content.Owner: String If not empty, only this player can pick up the item. Used by /give command.
content.Thrower: String Name of the player who threw the item. Used for the 'Diamonds to You' achievement.

Item.desc: The inventory item, without the Slot tag.
